    Show / Hide Table of Contents

    Class LevelSystem

    This level System should be encapsulated into game Object that implements Monobehaviour. To enable the game object reacting to experience changes, subscribe to the OnExperienceChanged event. To enable the game object reacting to level changes, subscribe to the OnLevelChanged event.

    Inheritance
    System.Object
    LevelSystem
